      static String percentEncode(String s)
      Percent encodes by doing the following: 1) url encode string using UTF8 2) apply additional encoding to string, replacing: "*" => "%2A" "+" => "%20" "%7E" => "~"

      • percentEncode

        public static String percentEncode(String s)
        Percent encodes by doing the following: 1) url encode string using UTF8 2) apply additional encoding to string, replacing: "*" => "%2A" "+" => "%20" "%7E" => "~"
        Parameters:
        s - the string to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded string
